tns:patch.author: Julian de Anquin
tns:patch.description: recreate view, this will always be the last version of the view

script.lang: SELECT settingsvalue FROM amp_global_settings where settingsname='Recreate the views on the next server restart';

DROP VIEW IF EXISTS v_nationalobjectives_code CASCADE; CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW v_nationalobjectives_code AS SELECT a.amp_activity_id, COALESCE(t.theme_code, '#') AS national_planning_objectives_code, a.amp_program_id FROM amp_activity_program a JOIN amp_theme t ON t.amp_theme_id = a.amp_program_id JOIN amp_program_settings aps ON aps.amp_program_settings_id = a.program_setting WHERE aps.name::text = 'National Plan Objective'::text;
